xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: A module for working with the EXI (Efficient XML Interchange) format.
A function which returns encoded EXI from an XML source.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:base64Binary? : the binary EXI result document

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: exi:encode-from-xml
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: exi:encode-from-xml($source-xml as node(), $schema-location as item()) as xs:base64Binary?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: A function which returns schema encoded EXI from an XML source.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:base64Binary? : the binary EXI result document

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: A function which returns XML from a decoded EXI source

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: exi:decode-to-xml
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: exi:decode-to-xml($source-exi as xs:base64Binary, $schema-location as item()) as node()?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: A function which return XML from a schema decoded EXI source
